title: Luxury Bungalow for sale @ Kalalgoda
details:
Architecturally designed split level spacious bungalow for sale at Kalalgoda
Large sitting and dinning area
Five bed rooms, Four bath rooms
Office room
shrine room
TV lobby, Library
Modern fitted pantry.
Two wet kitchens
Servant quarters and driver quarters
Large landscaped garden
Facing to 20 ft wide private road
Basement area
